name: RAD (itch) (oramun, metalJIM)
description:
Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move around. SPACE or UP to jump.

Rescue survivors before the radiation gets too high or your health runs out.

Survivor = more health

Orbs reduce radiation

Change Log 7/4/22:

- Fixed a hole in the level where the player fell through and couldn't get out

- Fixed the play controller where the play got stuck facing one direction

- Resized the UI properly for WebGL aspect
